text: Barłogi (formerly German Berloge) is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bobrowice within Krosno Odrzańskie County, Lubusz Voivodeship. It is in western Poland. It is about south of Bobrowice. It is about south of Krosno Odrzańskie and west of Zielona Góra. Before 1945 the area was part of Germany (see Territorial changes of Poland after World War II). The village has a population of 85. ==References== Category:Villages in Lubusz Voivodeship
title: Barłogi, Lubusz Voivodeship
